normalised: Maka konnem Mumbaiantle tipikal groceries billanchi zannvai vicharli. Tem khorench tumchea jivit shailicher adharit asta, barem? Eklo bachelor ekloch jiyeta tor taka tin hazar rupya te panch hazar rupya ek mahinyak karch lagta zalea to bhair jevta ani fokot bread, dhoodh (ek liter maka sadharan tin dis poddta), ani magari sarkhe vostu gheuta.

unnormalised: Konnem Mhaka Mumbaiantle tipikal grocery billachem vixim vicharlem. Tem khorem tumchea jivit jiyetalecher adharit asa, kiteak nhoi? Eklo bachelor ekloch ravon sumar Rs. 3000-Rs. 5000 ek mhoinyak kharch korunk xakta zalea te chodd korun bhair jevta ani fokot bread, dudh (1 litre sumar 3 dis cholta mhaka), ani kiteim Maggi ghevnk xakta.
normalised: Pun eka chougdik kutumbak zaitich karch lagta. Mhojem mhan'nem mhanje fresh bhajipallo, dairy, tandool, dall ani her vostu gheunk ek kutumbak aath hazar rupya te pandhra hazar rupya lagtat. Hanga tumhi local markitantlea dukhanthun va D-Martantle gheun khatat aslear. Supermarkets zoxem Nature's Basket ani karch vaddoitat. Ani organic vastu? Tem bhog, anik pachis taka vadounk poddta.

unnormalised: Pun, eka 4 familichek kesin, kharchacho ankhdo vhodd astolo. Mhaka dista ki tor ek famil fresh bhaji polo, dairy, tandul, dal ani dusrim mukhia vostu gheuncheak sumar Rs. 8000-Rs. 15000 dor mhoinyak kharch korunk poddttolem. Hem tor tumi local market vo D-Mart koslea zagear shopping kortat. Supermarket Nature's Basket kuxile, tenne tumchea kharchacho ankhdo vaddonk xakta. Ani organic vostu? Visrun voch, anink 25% vaddau.
normalised: Online shoppingui eka motthem factora. Bigbasket va Blinkit sarkhe sites sulabh astat, pun tankam promochional discounts astat. Tumhi sohjeach panchshe rupya tumchea poilea orderar vachoitat ani anik donso rupya coupon codes vaprun vachoitat. Tumchea dukana lagich aslelya kirana storeanche bhav tulna korunk visrunk naka online optionsancher bharvaso dovortana, khasan korun sakhar (ek kilogram) va mith (teuch ek kilogram) sarkhyar vostun khatir.

unnormalised: Online shopping ek vhodd karonn zaun asa. Bigbasket vo Blinkit kosle site sompe zata punn te chodd korun promotional discount deta. Tumi sumar ₹ 500 tumchea poile ordercher ani anink ₹ 200 coupon code vaprun salvar korunk xakta. Punn tumchea lagchea kirana storechi kimmat compare kar online optionancher atanche visvas dourak vochona, khas korun everyday item vostunchem khatir zoxim sakar (1kg) vo mit (temui 1 kg).
normalised: Shevttim, groceriesak budget korop ek vyakti vixay asha. Tumchea karchacho patth lavat eka mahinyak, tumchi poisa kiteak karch zata tenh pova ani magir badol korun ghyat. Teh" spontaneous "chocolate cravings" soddunk naka jim sadharan donso rupya zata. Asha kortam hem upyogi zatolem!

unnormalised: Nimanneponni, grocerykhatir budgeting korop ek vyaktigat vostu zaun asa. Tumchea kharchacher ek mhoino poriant nazar dovra, tumchem duddu kitlem voita tem polla ani taka lagun sambhallun ghe. Tumchem dolle "chocolate craving" vochunk visrunk vochonakat tem sumar Rs. 150 poddta. Mhaka asha asa ki hem tumak upkari poddttolem!
